About technicials what i did

Hello everyone,

I created this source code to show you my technical skills and to show my work. I build everything new in this source code.

Actually, I can use Angular or another Framework to do this source but I did not use it. I decided to build our own Framework (lightweight) using:

  • a little bit of jQuery
  • NativeScript
  • SASSto compile CSS
  • PUG Templateto compile HTML
  • GULPJSto build the source code

I decided to go the hard way because I want to show you my work and I want to show you my skills.

I finished this source code in less than 10 hours and I have 3 hours to create the source code structure wrote documents, test, deploy, etc...

SOURCE CODE

I uploaded the source code to my GitHub account. You can see it here: https://github.com/baonguyenyam/meyer

LIVE SITE

I deployed the source code to my server. You can see it here: https://test.wow-wp.com

Anyway, I hope you enjoy this source code. And thank you to visit my site.

Have a great day!
